LTRCounter.title: Left-to-right Counts (LTR)
LTRCounter.description: All objects passed by from left to right in the last measure interval

LTRSpeed.title: Avg Speed (LTR)
LTRSpeed.description: Average speed of all objects passed by from left to right in the last measure interval

RTLCounter.title: Right-to-left Counts (RTL)
RTLCounter.description: All objects passed by from left to right in the last measure interval

RTLSpeed.title: Avg Speed (RTL)
RTLSpeed.description: Average speed of objects passed by from right to left in the last measure interval
